name: Live or Die (Chromecore, LeprosyKing)
description:
__________

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam Theme: Roll of the Dice

__________

Description:

Every 15 seconds the dice will roll and give you a random select weapon. You must then use that weapon to defend an orb against enemies attackers. But beware the orb likes to change locations.

__________

Controls:

Move - WASD

Jump - Space

Shoot - Enter

__________
